root.name: Dungeon
root.description: OverviewFight your way through the dungeon that's full of bats, skeletons, zombies and other monsters.Â Find the evil Necromancer Malik Adbul Aziz, kill him and recover the Great Orb of Thoth.Before you enter the dungeon you must select a character class and there's seven to choose from:Warrior,Fighter,Cleric,Mage,Thief,Barbarian,Superhero.Each class starts with different equipment.
